data.actual_result: Each extra character will replace the content of the previous character at the last position, and for each of them a new pair of toasts "invalid pin" and "404 not found" will be generated
data.expected_result: It should stop attempting to input letters as soon as the last one gets filled
data.short_description: In the screen to enter the XBox Live PIN code, if you enter many characters in the last field, the app will be flooded with toasts
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your account settings > Connections - Add > XBox Live - Enter the 5 first digits of the code - When you are at the last digit, try to enter many characters before all the fields get erased
